results.title: How do changes in the mtDNA and mitochondrial dysfunction influence cancer and cancer therapy? Challenges, opportunities and models.
results.text_hl: Pharmaceutical impairment of @<m>DISEASE_CoQ_responsive_OXPHOS_deficiency</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C535470 @@@OXPHOS@@@ by @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ can increase the efficiency of radiotherapy.
